definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
hot pot/a dish where thinly sliced meat and vegetables are boiled briefly in a broth and then served with dipping sauces

sentences.english: Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the cilantro and green onions.
sentences.chinese: 从炉上端开锅子，洒上芫荽叶和葱。

sentences.english: Take the pan away quickly; it's boiling over.
sentences.chinese: 快把锅子端开，里面的东西都煮得溢出来了。

sentences.english: Our cooking pots are all made of stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 我们的煮菜锅子全部都是由不锈钢做成的。

sentences.english: That pandanus was as big as a pot.
sentences.chinese: 那投果像一个锅子那么大。

sentences.english: If nothing sticks to Teflon, how does it stick to pans ?
sentences.chinese: 如果铁氟龙什么也不沾，那它又怎么能黏在锅子上？

sentences.english: I couldn't hold the wok because the hot oil splashed onto my hand.
sentences.chinese: 锅子翻了因为热油溅到了我的手上。

sentences.english: Pot body and fever plate can conveniently, so it is easy to clean pot separation.
sentences.chinese: 锅体与发热板可以随手分离，这样便于清洗锅子。

sentences.english: We'll also have access to leprechaun pots of gold, which will help us pay down our national debt.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有小精灵锅子里的金子来帮我们还国债了。

sentences.english: I have to find a caldron to log completely in water.
sentences.chinese: 我得找个大锅子把树干浸在冷水里。

sentences.english: Mother clashed two pans together to wake us up.
sentences.chinese: 母亲将两只锅子互敲来唤醒我们。

sentences.english: Every family cooking-pot has a black spot.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭的锅子都有黑色的污点。

sentences.english: Very simple, as long as the pots have a gas stove on it.
sentences.chinese: 很简单，只要有锅子有煤气炉就可以了。

sentences.english: There's no way out. It looks as if we'll even have to sell our cooking pot.
sentences.chinese: 再也没有办法了，这样下去，连小锅子也都卖去了。

sentences.english: Next he put eggs in a pan of water on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他把鸡蛋放进炉子上一个装着水的锅子里。

definition: wok with a long handle/wok spatula/ladle
